description:
Jumpei was fascinated by ballet as a boy but gave up on dancing to pursue Jeet Kune Do. One day, when he is in junior high, his classmate notices his intrest and invites him to do ballet with her.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: There`s No Way I`m Doing That Ballet Thing!
やるわけねーだろ, バレエなんて!
